params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of channels in the input image.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: The size of the input patch.

params.name: stride
params.description: The stride of the input patch.

params.name: pool_size
params.description: The size of the pooling window.

params.name: mlp_ratio
params.description: The ratio of the number of channels in the output of the MLP to the number of channels in the input.

params.name: depths
params.description: The depth of each encoder block.

params.name: hidden_sizes
params.description: The hidden sizes of each encoder block.

params.name: patch_sizes
params.description: The size of the input patch for each encoder block.

params.name: strides
params.description: The stride of the input patch for each encoder block.

params.name: padding
params.description: The padding of the input patch for each encoder block.

params.name: drop_path_rate
params.description: The dropout rate for the dropout layers.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The activation function for the hidden layers.

params.name: layer_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value for the layer scale.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The initializer range for the weights.
